PositionHistory.Title: Research Analyst
PositionHistory.Description:
Creating the database of customers and bifurcating them as existing, potential and AMC(Annual Maintenance Contract)
customer as per guidelines provided by Dassault Systems.
Analyzing the database and making insights about potential customers and arranging technical meetings on the basis of their requirements.
Preparing quarterly reports of sales and visualizing the reports through pie charts, line charts, etc.
